title: Topic 003 Question 024
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant named contoso.com. The tenant contains the users shown in the following table.
You create a resource group named RG1.
Which users can modify the permissions for RG1 and which users can create virtual networks in RG1? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
